text: evar mitu (allahvin tantanai parriya) vakku urutiyaki vittato avarkal, "enkal iraiva! Nankal evarkalai valiketuttomo avarkal ivarkal tam. Nankal valikettatu ponre, ivarkalaiyum nankal valiketuttom - unnitam nankal (avarkalai vittum) vilakik kolkirom avarkal enkalai vanankik kontirukkavillai" enru kuruvarkal
